section.section: A licensee may surrender a license by sending to the Commissioner a written statement that the license is surrendered.
The statement shall provide a listing, by identifying number, face amount, and place of issue, of all outstanding payment instruments, and the reasons for the license surrender.

text.section:
The surrender of a license does not:
Affect any civil or criminal liability of the licensee for acts committed before the license is surrendered;
Affect the surety device filed by the licensee; or
Entitle the licensee to the return of any part of any fee.
